Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Assembly and Senate to pass, and the Governor to sign, a State budget which does not bar the City of New York from using State reimbursements for rental subsidy programs for the homeless, and calling on the City of New York and State of New York to work together to create a rental subsidy program for the homeless.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: State budget which does not bar NYC from using State reimbursements for rental subsidy programs for the homeless.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending:   The Public Advocate (Ms. James)
